item.title: HR exec caught on Coldplay cam resigns after embrace with CEO went viral
item.description: Kristin Cabot, an executive at tech company Astronomer, has resigned after a viral video showed her embracing CEO Andy Byron at a Coldplay concert

item.title: A bull moose is blocking a New York mountain trail. Wildlife researchers don't know why
item.description: New York wildlife officials have closed a trail in the Adirondack Mountains this summer due to a bull moose lingering around the area
